DOC.brief_title: To Achieve Early Reendothelialization Expense Low Restenosis : The EREMUS Study
DOC.criteria: Stable unstable angina pectoris suitable PCI least one coronary vessel Age > 18 year Recent ( < 72 hour ) acute myocardial infarction Creatinine clearance < 40 ml/min Allergy hypersensitivity least two : aspirin , clopidogrel , heparin , bivalirudin , paclitaxel , contrast medium Life expectancy < 1 year
